name: Timeless Explorer
description:
-- THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE NOKIA 3310 #5 GAME JAM --
-- WARNING: THIS GAME MAY HAVE FLASHING IMAGES, PLAYER HAS BEEN WARNED --

You, brave  explorer, was exploring an unknown planet with your crew, unknown of the dangers that were coming ahead. You enter a mysterious building with your crew, when all of a sudden, the lights turn off and back, seeing each of your crewmates die, one by one. The ground starts shaking, until you fall into an unknown underworld. You feel a strange sense of time control, like if you had the power to control the time around you. Maybe you should explore, it doesn't seem to stop.

-- CONTROLS --
Right / Left : Move right / left
Up: Look up / Open chests
Down: crounch
Z: Jump
X: Shoot
A: Slow down / go back to normal speed
S: Start Game


Thanks to NinjaGhost and 64VII for playtesting!
